text: bulsinjadeul-i buljiog-e issge doeneun nal neohuineun hyeonse-ui saenghwal-eseo joh-eun geosdeul-eul buyeo badgoseo hyanglaggwa olag-e tamnighaess-euni oneul neohuiegeneun suchiseuleoun eungbeol-ui bosangman-i iss-eul ppun-ila ineun neohuiga jisang-e seo omanhae hago bangtanghaessgi ttaeun-i laneun mal-i geudeul-ege iss-eulila
